mapper.select: select category.cate_name, supplier.supplier_name, goods.* from `mybatisplus-4`.goods, `mybatisplus-4`.category, `mybatisplus-4`.supplier where `mybatisplus-4`.goods.cate_id = `mybatisplus-4`.category.cate_id and `mybatisplus-4`.goods.supplier_id = `mybatisplus-4`.supplier.supplier_id and goods_id = #{goodsId}
